description: What to do in areas where defilement is rampant
title: Confirmed: Defilement is rampant in communities
content:
U-reporters confirmed that defilement is rampant in their communities. Guardians need to be very responsible for their children, especially when in public places. If you know any one whose family has experienced child sacrifice in your community, you can report child sacrifice incidences in your community. 

 1. At Community level, you report to the LC1 Chair person or Vice Chair person who is responsible for Children’s Affairs. 
 2. At Sub County level the Family and Child protection Officer in Police though most districts have this unit at District level (So any police officer present can be reported to). 
 3. You can call toll free Child helpline 116  
 4. Send a message to 8500 
 5. You can also report to the Probation and Welfare Officer at the District who is the technical officer responsible for all Children’s affairs.

[Ur Story][1]

[Ur Rights][2]


  [1]: http://iogt.qa-hub.unicore.io/page/590f8f39c74e4e44a07c6a31e941b976/
  [2]: http://iogt.qa-hub.unicore.io/page/44e01f6fca9843f3babb6d507a7d9deb/
